thread.title: Myron Drinkwater
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Myron Drinkwater

author: Myron Drinkwater
title: Myron Drinkwater
text: I make some of the best pork ribs using my homemade dry rub but the ribs I first experienced as a gift are better than I can make and better than any other pork ribs I've ever had. They are perfectly seasoned, whether wet or dry, and some of the meatiest ribs I've ever found. I now rely on having Burgers' ribs shipped to me in southern California for my pork ribs. I prefer the dry rub ribs and if I want them wet I slather on some barbecue sauce of my choice either before or after heating the precooked ready to eat rack or half rack to satisfy my rib cravings.
